alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:57AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HOT TEMPERATURES FOR NORTHERN NEVADA FOLLOWED BY SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS... The heat wave across northern Nevada continues this weekend with high temperatures in the mid 90s to lower 100s. Today will be dry and mostly sunny. Sunday will see an increase in moisture and clouds, bringing a chance for a few showers and storms later in the day pushing up from central Nevada. Monday will see better potential for more scattered to widespread showers and storms, especially northeast Nevada. Heavy downpours and fairly slow storm motions could lead to a localized flash flooding threat. More showers and storms possible Tuesday, mainly across northeast Nevada. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
